TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RegistrationServices extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices.IRegistrationServices

summary.span: 提供一組服務用來從 COM 註冊和取消註冊 Managed 組件。

span.span: Provides a set of services for registering and unregistering managed assemblies for use from COM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 組件內的物件會使用由 COM 用戶端時，就需要登錄。Registration is needed when the objects within an assembly are being used by COM clients. [Regasm.exe （組件登錄工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)和[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]使用所公開的方法類別來新增或移除受管理組件啟用 COM 的登錄項目。The [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md) and [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] use methods exposed by the class to add or remove COM-enabling registry entries for managed assemblies. 您可以使用下列方法，以協助您準備登錄檔案：You can use the following methods to assist you in preparing a registration file: - - - - 雖然這些方法協助開始收集資訊以用於登錄檔案，但是它們實際上並不產生登錄檔。Although these methods help in gathering information to be used in a registration file, they do not actually produce a registration file. 相反地，您可以使用[Regasm.exe （組件登錄工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)工具`/regfile`選項來執行這項工作。Instead, you can use the [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md) tool with the `/regfile` option to perform this task. 無法匯出的方法，並註冊類型程式庫。 methods cannot export and register a type library. 若要匯出及註冊類型程式庫，您可以使用[Regasm.exe （組件登錄工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md)工具和[Tlbexp.exe （類型程式庫匯出工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md)工具。To export and register a type library, you can use the [Regasm.exe (Assembly Registration Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/regasm-exe-assembly-registration-tool.md) tool and the [Tlbexp.exe (Type Library Exporter)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md) tool.

summary.span: 註冊 Managed 組件中的類別，以啟用從 COM 的建立。

span.span: Registers the classes in a managed assembly to enable creation from COM.

span.span: if contains types that were successfully registered; otherwise if the assembly contains no eligible types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `RegisterAssembly` 將適當的登錄項目類型中指定的組件。`RegisterAssembly` adds the appropriate registry entries for the types in the specified assembly. 這個方法也會呼叫組件中找到的任何註冊函式。This method also calls any registration functions found in the assembly. 使用以取得組件。Use to get an assembly.

summary.span: 向 COM 註冊指定的型別。

span.span: Registers the specified type with COM.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，使用平台叫用呼叫 unmanaged`CoRegisterClassObject`和`CoDisconnectObject`不支援註冊和取消註冊的 COM 物件的方法。Note that using platform invoke to call the unmanaged `CoRegisterClassObject` and `CoDisconnectObject` methods for registration and unregistration of COM objects is not supported.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void RegisterTypeForComClients (Type type, ref Guid g);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterTypeForComClients(class System.Type type, valuetype System.Guid& g) cil managed
public: virtual void RegisterTypeForComClients(Type ^ type, Guid % g);

param.name: type
param.span: 要登錄以便從 COM 使用的 。

span.span: The to be registered for use from COM.
The used to register the specified type.

summary.span: 使用指定的 GUID 來註冊 COM 的特定型別。

span.span: Registers the specified type with COM using the specified GUID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法相當於呼叫`CoRegisterClassObject`在 COM 中This method is equivalent to calling `CoRegisterClassObject` in COM. 方法不是不可部分完成，而且可能會導致無法預期的結果用於多執行緒的內容時。The method is not atomic and can cause unpredictable results when used in a multithreaded context. 在版本 2.0 和更新版本中，使用方法來取消登錄 COM 中的型別In version 2.0 and later, use the method to unregister a type in COM. 請注意，使用平台叫用呼叫 unmanaged`CoRegisterClassObject`和`CoDisconnectObject`不支援註冊和取消註冊的 COM 物件的方法。Note that using platform invoke to call the unmanaged `CoRegisterClassObject` and `CoDisconnectObject` methods for registration and unregistration of COM objects is not supported.

span.span: The parameter is .
The parameter cannot be created.

permission.span: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual int RegisterTypeForComClients (Type type, System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext classContext, System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationConnectionType flags);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 RegisterTypeForComClients(class System.Type type, valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationClassContext classContext, valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.RegistrationConnectionType flags) cil managed

public: virtual int RegisterTypeForComClients(Type ^ type, System::Runtime::InteropServices::RegistrationClassContext classContext, System::Runtime::InteropServices::RegistrationConnectionType flags);

param.name: type
param.span: 要登錄以便從 COM 使用的 物件。

span.span: The object to register for use from COM.

param.name: classContext
param.span: 其中一個 值，表示可執行程式碼將在其中執行的內容。

span.span: One of the values that indicates the context in which the executable code will be run.

param.name: flags
param.span: 其中一個 值，指定如何與類別物件進行連接。

span.span: One of the values that specifies how connections are made to the class object.

summary.span: 使用指定的執行內容和連接類型，向 COM 註冊指定的型別。

span.span: Registers the specified type with COM using the specified execution context and connection type.
An integer that represents a cookie value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法相當於呼叫`CoRegisterClassObject`在 COM 中This method is equivalent to calling `CoRegisterClassObject` in COM. 方法不是不可部分完成，而且可能會導致無法預期的結果用於多執行緒的內容時。The method is not atomic and can cause unpredictable results when used in a multithreaded context. 在.NET Framework 2.0 或更新版本中，使用方法來取消登錄 COM 中的型別In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, use the method to unregister a type in COM. 請注意，使用平台叫用呼叫 unmanaged`CoRegisterClassObject`和`CoDisconnectObject`不支援註冊和取消註冊的 COM 物件的方法。Note that using platform invoke to call the unmanaged `CoRegisterClassObject` and `CoDisconnectObject` methods for registration and unregistration of COM objects is not supported.

span.span: The parameter is .
The parameter cannot be created.

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

span.span: Unregisters the classes in a managed assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UnregisterAssembly` 移除先前加入所指定的組件中類型的登錄項目。`UnregisterAssembly` removes the registry entries for the types in the specified assembly previously added by . 這個方法也會呼叫組件中找到的任何取消登錄函式。This method also calls any unregistration functions found in the assembly.
